name: omni_rival_01
text: Your congregation of squirrels and chipmunks cannot save you, Chen.
text_simple: your congregation of squirrels and chipmunks cannot save you chen

name: omni_rival_02
text: Chen, faith is a tool, not a bludgeon. You would have done well to learn this.
text_simple: chen faith is a tool not a bludgeon you would have done well to learn this

name: omni_rival_03
text: In you I have bested the inferno itself!
text_simple: in you i have bested the inferno itself

name: omni_rival_05
text: Lifestealer, I will find what did this to you.
text_simple: lifestealer i will find what did this to you

name: omni_rival_06
text: Reality is no longer your plaything, Weaver.
text_simple: reality is no longer your plaything weaver

name: omni_rival_07
text: The prophecies seem to have overestimated you, Bane.
text_simple: the prophecies seem to have overestimated you bane

text: Tinker, your science meddles where mortals should not.
text_simple: tinker your science meddles where mortals should not
